title: So sick of obvious boosters in my games
body:
For example people whos name is "yoloswagmaster420" (not the exact name but very close, wish I was making that up) who went gold V to diamond V 0 LP in 1 season yet in season 6 their ranked winrate is like 39% and they've dropped down to plat V

It's incredibly frustrating. Games are decided before they even start not only because of shit matchmaking but because your punishment system focuses on people who call people names in chat instead of people who ruin gameplay by hacking or boosting.

replies.body: Those aren't boosters, those are boosted players. Anyway, who really cares about DQ rankings. It's meaningless anyway since you don't know how they got it. I'll care a lot more when solo que is back.

> [{quoted}](name=SirPurrr,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=zxmZJf36,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-02-24T17:07:52.725+0000)
>
> Those aren't boosters, those are boosted players. Anyway, who really cares about DQ rankings. It's meaningless anyway since you don't know how they got it. I'll care a lot more when solo que is back.

That's what I meant
funny how smurfs should be considered boosters as they give an unfair advantage to their team.
Idc how toxic someone is unless they feed or afk and that's what everyone's opinion should be.
It's funny that you should use a name like that, because I'm 420MCYOLOSWAG on OCE.
